0.title: Amazon CloudWatch now supports cross-account anomaly detection

1.title: Cross-account observability enabled for CloudWatch Internet Monitor

2.title: Amazon OpenSearch Service doubles storage for OR1 and expands to four more regions

3.title: AWS Lambda supports Kafka event sources in four new regions

4.title: Amazon Cognito is now available in Asia Pacific (Melbourne) Region

5.title: Amazon Cognito customers can secure access to APIs using Amazon Verified Permissions

6.title: AWS Transfer Family introduces a new workshop for SFTP

7.title: Launch Amazon CloudWatch Internet Monitor from Amazon CloudFront console

8.title: Announcing availability of AWS Outposts in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

9.title: Knowledge Bases for Amazon Bedrock offers support for CloudFormation and Service Quotas

10.title: Amazon Location Service releases Tracking SDK for iOS and Android

11.title: Amazon OpenSearch Ingestion now supports enrichment of streaming data with geographical location

12.title: Amazon DataZone launches integration with AWS Glue Data Quality

13.title: Amazon RDS now supports M6gd database instances in six additional AWS regions

14.title: Amazon CloudWatch now supports tagging alarms with AWS CloudFormation

15.title: Amazon Bedrock is now available in the AWS Europe (Paris) Region

16.title: Amazon CloudWatch RUM is generally available in 11 additional AWS Regions

17.title: Amazon DataZone announces integration with AWS Lake Formation hybrid mode

18.title: AWS Transfer Family offers predefined security policies for SFTP connectors

19.title: AWS Lambda adds support for Ruby 3.3

20.title: AWS Clean Rooms ML is now generally available

21.title: AWS Application Migration Service now supports migration of UEFI servers

22.title: Research and Engineering Studio on AWS Version 2024.04 now available

23.title: Amazon OpenSearch Service now lets you update node count without blue/green

24.title: Announcing AWS Transfer Family workshop for building secure file transfer solutions using SFTP

25.title: Amazon SageMaker notebooks now support P5, C6i, C7i, M6i, M7i, R6i, and R7i instance types

26.title: Amazon RDS for MySQL supports rds_superuser_role for easier implementation of role based privileges

27.title: AWS AppSync forwards application request headers to AWS Lambda custom authorizer functions

28.title: Amazon SageMaker Studio Code Editor now supports custom images

29.title: Amazon CloudFront now supports Common Media Client Data (CMCD) fields in real-time logs

30.title: Amazon VPC CNI now supports automatic subnet discovery

31.title: AWS India customers can now use UPI (Unified Payments Interface) to make payments

32.title: AWS B2B Data Interchange is now HIPAA eligible and supports X12 version 5010 HIPAA transactions

33.title: Amazon IVS Low-Latency Streaming now supports SRT ingest

34.title: Knowledge Bases for Amazon Bedrock now supports Claude 3 Haiku

35.title: Amazon CodeCatalyst now supports adding tasks to issues

36.title: AWS Elemental MediaLive now supports CMAF Ingest output group

37.title: Amazon Route 53 adds support for 18 additional Top-Level Domains

38.title: Mistral Large foundation model now available on Amazon Bedrock
